options.optionText: How are you feeling after… that?
options.responseText: *wipes her lips quickly* I… I don’t know… weird… gross… kinda… tingly… I don’t know… don’t ask me that right now…

followUpOptions.responseText: *lets out a shaky breath* I… I don’t know… maybe… maybe not… it just… it felt like I wasn’t myself… like my brain turned off and… ugh, just… forget it.

followUpOptions.optionText: You looked so cute with my cock in your mouth.
followUpOptions.responseText: Stop… just… stop talking… god… Don’t say shit like that… it’s messed up…

followUpOptions.optionText: You went quiet. What’s going on in your head?
followUpOptions.responseText: *stares blankly at the floor* I don’t know… it’s like… everything feels heavy… and my chest hurts… but also… I can’t stop… feeling… weird… inside…
Like… like I want to curl up and die from embarrassment… but… also… I don’t know… warm… just… shut up…

followUpOptions.optionText: Your mouth felt amazing. I want more next time.
followUpOptions.responseText: *eyes dart up in panic* Next time?! I… I don’t… know if I’m ready for that… god… I can’t even think straight right now…

options.optionText: Would you… ever want to do it again?
options.responseText: *tenses* I… I don’t know… okay? Don’t… don’t ask me that right now… my head’s all… messy…
*blushes deeper* Don’t… thank me… it’s weird…
Y-yeah… bye… and… just… don’t tell anyone… please…

auto_lines: God… what did I just do…
God… I can still taste it…
